name: FunnyLab
description: TweeVee is a lightweight HTML5+javascript engine for interactive videos. You can create a branching movie in the style of [Black Mirror: Bandersnatch](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VNw9DAwp2Kk) starting from Twee files exported from the popular hypertext editor Twine. The movies are meant to be played via browser. TweeVee is basically a single, easily customizable javascript file. It uses no external libraries except for jquery.
